articles.title: NASA astronaut Mark Vande Hei breaks single longest spaceflight record - Economic Times
articles.description: Kudos to NASA Astronaut Mark Vande Hei! On Tuesday, 15th March 2022, Mark successfully broke the record of longest single spaceflight by an American explorer.
